casebody.data:
Perimet, Inc., et al. v. Priscilla Turnbull et al. Charles Turnbull et al. v. Charles Nessler et al. Fenwick Engineering, Inc. v. Charles Nessler et al. (5033)

Borden, Spallone and Foti, Js.

Argued April 5 — decision released April 21, 1988 Charles Nessler, with whom was Charles E. Sohl, for the appellants (plaintiffs in the first case, defendants in the second and third cases). Andrew Brand, with whom, on the brief, was Lloyd L. Langhammer, for the appellees (named defendant et al. in the first case, named plaintiff et al. in the second and third cases). Leeland J. Cole-Chu, with whom, on the brief, was Joseph A. Cipparone, for the appellees (defendants in the first case Russell Brown et al.). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
